thinking: The first item, "Hefty Ultra Strong Tall Kitchen Trash Bags" has an "Add to cart" button at index 7. I will click this button to add the item to the cart.
Now closing the advertisement by clicking on the close button at index 1.
I will now proceed to the shopping cart to finalize the order. Clicking element with index 9.
